name: RitualEscape
description:
From the game jam hosted by Game Dev Network,  with the theme, Rebirth, Ritual Escape is a Puzzle-Adventure game that will test your capability to escape the curse of the priest mage by being reborn just to escape this madness. Equipped with different puzzles, you must traverse different areas to escape. Be careful because the priest mage might be watching you. 

The controls for this game is a simple WASD or arrow keys. 

R - to be reborn which can only be used once.

E - to interact with different objects

Esc- to open the main menu.

The game currently have only 2 levels as time permits from this game jam.

Programmer and Artist: Name: @justineamul Code Name:@aquamagneto

Music and Level Designer: @yurabronksy

Kindly extract the zip file attached and then select the executable file once downloaded.
